summary: IZE Case Resolver MVP - Complete e2e testing of authentication, admin panel, and user flows. All 25 backend tests passed. Frontend UI testing successful.
critical_code_review_comments: Code structure is well-organized with modular routes/, models/, services/ pattern
Password validation correctly implemented with regex checks for complexity
All data-testid attributes present on interactive elements
seed_data_creation: Multiple test users created during testing with TEST_ prefix pattern
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features tested and working: Landing page, registration with password validation, login (admin/user), admin dashboard with analytics, admin user management with filtering, admin cases listing, user upload page, user cases page, logout. Backend refactored to modular structure (models/, routes/, services/) works correctly.

features_tested.landing_page: PASS - Hero section, features, CTA buttons all visible

registration.form_fields: PASS - full_name, email, phone_number, branch fields present
registration.password_validation: PASS - 8+ chars, uppercase, lowercase, special char validation working

login.admin_login: PASS - admin@ize.com login successful, redirects to /admin/dashboard

admin_dashboard.analytics_display: PASS - Shows total users (7), total cases (6), weekly analysis, warranty decisions
admin_dashboard.branch_distribution: PASS - All 5 branches listed with counts

admin_user_management.list_users: PASS - 7 users displayed with full details

admin_cases.case_actions: PASS - View, Archive, Delete buttons present

features_tested.user_upload_page: PASS - File upload area, branch select, submit button present
features_tested.user_cases_page: PASS - Shows 'Henüz analiz yapmadınız' for new users
features_tested.logout: PASS - Logout redirects to login page
